com.stormpath.sdk.mail

Interface EmailTemplate<T extends EmailTemplate>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Saveable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModeledEmailTemplate, PasswordResetSuccessEmailTemplate

    public interface EmailTemplate<T extends EmailTemplate>
extends Resource, Saveable
    This resource provides operations to customize all the internal components (e.g. sender, subject, html body, etc) of emails that will be eventually used and sent by Stormpath in different scenarios (e.g. account creation verification, reset password, etc)
    Since:
    1.0.RC4

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the internal name used to identify this email template. This text will not be sent to the recipients.
        Returns:
        the internal name used to identify this email template.

      • getFromName

        String getFromName()
        Returns the name (e.g. John Doe) that will be used in the from field of the email.
        Returns:
        the name that will be used in the from field of the email.

      • getFromEmailAddress

        String getFromEmailAddress()
        Returns the sender email address. The receiver of the email will see it as being sent from this address.
        Returns:
        the sender email address.

      • setFromEmailAddress

        Specifies the sender email address. The receiver of the email will see it as being sent from this address.

      • getTextBody

        String getTextBody()
        Returns the body to be used in unformatted email messages (plain text).
        Returns:
        the body of plain text emails.

      • setTextBody

        T setTextBody(String textBody)
        Specifies the body to be used in unformatted email messages (plain text). This text will be sent when the mimeType has been set to MimeType.PLAIN_TEXT.
        Parameters:
        textBody - the body to be used in unformatted email messages.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        See Also:
        setMimeType(MimeType)

      • getHtmlBody

        String getHtmlBody()
        Returns the body to be used in HTML email messages.
        Returns:
        the body of HTML emails.

      • setHtmlBody

        T setHtmlBody(String htmlBody)
        Specifies the body to be used in HTML email messages. This text will be sent when the mimeType has been set to MimeType.HTML.
        Parameters:
        htmlBody - the body to be used in HTML email messages.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        See Also:
        setMimeType(MimeType)

      • getMimeType

        MimeType getMimeType()
        Describes the type of message the user will receive in his inbox.
        Returns:
        the type of message the user will receive in his inbox

      • setMimeType

        T setMimeType(MimeType mimeType)
        Specifies the kind of message that the user will receive in his inbox.
        • MimeType.HTML: the text contained in the htmlBody property will be sent
        • MimeType.PLAIN_TEXT: the text contained in the textBody property will be sent
        Parameters:
        mimeType - defines the type of message that the user will receive in his inbox.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
